column2: VARDESC
How many of your friends would you estimate . . . Smoke cigarettes?
How many of your friends would you estimate . . . Smoke marijuana (pot, weed) or hashish?
How many of your friends would you estimate . . . Take LSD?
How many of your friends would you estimate . . . Take other hallucinogens (mescaline, peyote, "shrooms" or psilocybin, PCP, etc.)?
How many of your friends would you estimate . . . Take amphetamines (uppers, pep pills, bennies, speed)?
How many of your friends would you estimate . . . Take Quaaludes (quads, methaqualone)?
How many of your friends would you estimate . . . Take sedatives/barbiturates (downers)?
How many of your friends would you estimate . . . Take tranquilizers?
How many of your friends would you estimate . . . Take cocaine?
How many of your friends would you estimate . . . Take heroin?
How many of your friends would you estimate . . . Take other narcotics (methadone, opium, codeine, etc.)?
How many of your friends would you estimate . . . Use inhalants (sniff glue, aerosols, laughing gas, etc.)?
How many of your friends would you estimate . . . Drink alcoholic beverages (liquor, beer, wine)?
How many of your friends would you estimate . . . Get drunk at least once a week?
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU doing each of the following things? Smoking one or more packs of cigarettes per day
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU doing each of the following things? Trying marijuana (pot, weed) once or twice
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU doing each of the following things? Smoking marijuana occasionally
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU doing each of the following things? Smoking marijuana regularly
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU doing each of the following things? Trying LSD once or twice
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU doing each of the following things? Trying an amphetamine (upper, pep pill, bennie, speed) once or twice
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU doing each of the following things? Trying cocaine once or twice
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU doing each of the following things? Taking cocaine occasionally
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU doing each of the following things? Taking one or two drinks nearly every day
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU doing each of the following things? Taking four or five drinks nearly every day
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU doing each of the following things? Having five or more drinks once or twice each weekend
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU doing each of the following things? Driving a car after having 1–2 drinks
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU doing each of the following things? Driving a car after having 5 or more drinks
